name: Junkyard Resource Forge
desc: A workshop run by members of JYD who disassemble the scrap worthy wrecks brought in by the fleet and break them down into usable resources.

name: Scrapyard Resource Forge
desc: An upgraded Workshop run by members of JYD who disassemble the scrap worthy wrecks brought in by the fleet and break them down into usable resources. The Scrapyard is able to handle more ship hulls and break them down more efficiently increasing output.
